title: Storm Queen's shield
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|A disc of crackling metal, created by a woman whose cunning artifice and crafty politics once united a continent. Most of her surviving inventions are closely guarded by various royals, ostensible proof of their claim to be her true successor, but this early prototype slipped through their fingers.}} [[File:Storm Queen's shield.png]] '''''the +5 Storm Queen's shield''''' +5 [[kite shield]]
When it blocks an attack, there's a 33% chance to electrocute the attacker (3d7 damage, ignoring 1/2 [[AC]]).{{source ref|0.30.1|art-func.h|541}}{{source ref|0.30.1|fineff.cc|511}} This works up to 3 tiles away.
[[electricity resistance|rElec]]
Allows [[flight]] ==Desirability== The '''Storm Queen's shield'''{{source ref|0.30.1|art-data.txt|1789}}, as just a +5 kite shield of rElec, would already be a great find for many characters. The extra retaliation damage - which few monsters resist - only makes it better. A good item for any shield-using character, though some may prefer a highly enchanted [[tower shield]] instead. ==History== *The Storm Queen's shield was added in [[0.30]]. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Shields]]
